title: Agent Schema
description: Agent json-specification : A full description of fields of an agent definition yaml file.

ArrayOfStrings.description: An array of strings custom type.

agentPortMapping.description: [Optional] - Array of dictionary-like objects, defining the port mapping.

name.description: [Required] - Agent full Name, accept lower case ascii, number and _, - characters.

version.description: [Optional] - Version of the agent respecting the semantic versioning format : major.minor.release.

source.description: [Optional] - URL to the agent source repository.

durability.description: [Optional] - Durability of the agent, e.g.,  temporary, development, published.

restrictions.description: [Optional] - Array of strings explaining the restrictions of the agent.

in_selectors.description: [Required] : Array of strings explaining the input selectors of the agent.

out_selectors.description: [Required] : Array of strings explaining the output selectors of the agent.

restart_policy.description: [Optional] - Restart policy of the agent, e.g., none, any, on-failure.

constraints.description: [Optional] - Array of strings explaining the constraints of the agent.

mounts.description: [Optional] - Array of strings of the mounts of the agent.

caps.description: [Optional] - Array of strings of kernel capabilities to add to the default set for the container.

mem_limit.description: [Optional] - Maximum memory that can be used by the agent in bytes.

port_mapping.description: [Optional] - Dictionary-like object, mapping a source port to a destination port.

docker_file_path.description: [Optional] - Path to the Dockerfile of the agent.

docker_build_root.description: [Optional] - Path to be used in as a context root to build the agent.

agent_path.description: [Optional] - Path to the agent code or executable

args.description: [Optional] - Array of dictionary-like objects, defining the agent arguments.

type.description: [Required] - Type of the agent argument : respecting the jsonschema types.

value.description: [Optional] - Default value of the agent argument.
